message: Let's make a deal! I think this is a fair split that benefits us both.
Let's split it fairly, I've made a concession
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal, and I'm willing to compromise. This offer is even better for you than my last, considering the time pressure and inflation.
I'm willing to negotiate, but I think I deserve a bit more. Inflation isn't affecting me, so let's make a deal!
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the most straightforward and fair deal. We are running out of time, and further negotiation might leave us with nothing.
